metadata.title: CVE-2016-3179 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - untriaged
metadata.description:
The processRequest function in minissdpd.c in MiniSSDPd 1.2.20130907-3allows local users to cause a denial of service (invalid free and daemoncrash) via vectors related to error handling.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3179` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

minissdpd - 1.5.20180223-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: minissdpd package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.5.20180223-1').
